name: Plucky
description:
Are you brave enough to take on the challenges Plucky has in store for you? Plucky merges fast paced, driving game play with puzzle game trick shots.

To play, pull back the colored puck, line up your shot to hit the target with the same color, and let loose. The levels grow increasingly more difficult, and require more finesse to consistently find the right target.

Race the shot clock. Shoot consecutive good shots to build up a massive multiplier to achieve high scores. Obtain stars to unlock new zones.

-------------------------------------------------------------------
* 3 difficulty levels, creating 3 unique play experiences
* 4 zones
* 48 levels
* Optimized for a wide range of phones and tablets
-------------------------------------------------------------------

New zones added regularly. Each addition will bring with it new challenges.
